Tunde Odunlade (Túndé Ọdúnladé na Yoruba), a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ịrị abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1954, bụ onye na-ese ihe, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na onye na-eti egwu na Naijiria nke a maara maka ihe osise Batik ya. Ọ bụ ọkachamara na nka akwa, na floatography. Ọ bụ onye otu Visual Artists Network nke United States of America (VAN) na onye na-esonyekarị na National Conference of Artists, New York
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Nigeria Cultural Troupe n'oge Festac
Ọ bi na Ibadan, mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa.

A mụrụ Babatunde Samuel Odunlade na 26 Nọvemba 1954 na Iremo, Ile-ife, ebe ọ nọrọ na mgbe ọ bụ nwata. Ọ zutere Yinka Adeyemi, onye otu ụlọ akwụkwọ nka nke Osogbo, wee malite ọrụ ya na mbido 1970 dị ka ọgbọ nke abụọ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ nka
Ọ gakwara Oguntimehin Art-workshop na Mahadum Ife n'afọ 1973. Tunde na-eji usoro ọdịnala site na usoro batik appliqué pụrụ iche na textiles
O mepụtakwara ụdị nke ọ na-akpọ floatograph, nka ya sitere na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị Yoruba, ọdịbendị na ndụ na Naịjirịa na ọkachamara na batiks, linocut, na akwụkwọ osisi
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na 1986 na 1989 na Stillman College, Tuscaloosa, Alabama.
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nka na Toki Memorial Arts Centre, Ibadan n'afọ 1989, O guzobekwara International Campaign for Better Arts and Cultural Awareness (ICBACA).
Na Disemba 2020, o guzobere Tunde Odunlade Arts and Culture Connexions na Ibadan, Oyo steeti.
